snippet: The Lockkeeper’s House, the oldest structure on the National Mall, will get a facelift and a new address, the Trust for the National Mall announced this week.
abstract: The Lockkeeper’s House, the oldest structure on the National Mall, will get a facelift and a new address, the Trust for the National Mall announced this week.
lead_paragraph: The Lockkeeper’s House, the oldest structure on the National Mall, will get a facelift and a new address, the Trust for the National Mall announced this week.

headline.main: Lockkeeper’s House on National Mall to Be Restored
